manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: OVERVIEW: Showcase your own style with The Frame. Showcase lifelike art, photos, TV, and movies in stunning 4K resolution on a display with customizable bezels* for endless combinations to customize your décor. Transform The Frame into a beautiful work of art when you're not watching TV with Art Mode. The elegant, modern design blends flawlessly to elevate your home décor. Modern Frame Design Minimalist-inspired and intended to enhance any space, The Frame's profile is redesigned to be slimmer* with a monochromatic back for beauty from every angle. Art Mode The Frame transforms to art when you're not watching TV. Choose from the Samsung Collection or upload your own pieces to reflect your personality. Built-in sensors* automatically optimize the picture to your environment and turn the screen off when you're away. Customizable Bezel Create the perfect match for your space with two styles of bezel options in multiple colorways. Select the ones that suit your mood and apply in a snap — innovative magnetic application makes it easy to switch things up. Bring more than a billion colors to life With 100% Color Volume*, Quantum Dot Technology delivers over a billion shades of color that stay true-to-life without washing out at any level of brightness. Powerful, intelligent 4K processing Samsung's powerful processor takes your viewing experience to the next level, with technology that automatically optimizes both picture and sound for a more immersive experience. See everything in 4K See every detail come to life with 4K resolution picture. 4K AI upscaling automatically analyzes the input source to reduce image noise, restore lost detail, and define edges around objects and text.* True-to-life colors Innovative 16-bit color mapping technology brings dazzling color accuracy, detail and contrast — even in bright scenes or settings. * Viewing experience may vary according to types of content and format. Upscaling may not apply when connected to PC or in Game Mode. Slim Fit Wall Mount Hang The Frame flush against the wall like real art — even letting you easily adjust the viewing angle or flip it vertically to portrait mode. Studio Stand Reimagine how you use your space with an easel stand⁸ that lets you place the TV anywhere in the room, concealing wires in its legs for clean lines, no matter where you place it. Frame your own masterpieces Artwork isn't the only thing you can display on your TV. Send your photos to The Frame with your phone or USB flash drive and share a masterpiece of your own making. Personalize the personal Complement your artwork with realistic matting options for the perfect look. Choose from 5 mat backgrounds in a palette of 16 colors. Expanded memory With double the memory (16GB) vs. prior editions you always have room for all your high-res photos and more. Adaptive Sound+ Hear everything at its best with optimized sound based on real-time audio scenic intelligence. Adaptive Sound+ automatically adjusts audio to enhance everything from dialogue, music and sports. Sound optimized to your space For the best possible sound no matter where you place it, The Frame self-calibrates the audio to the room's acoustics. Dual LED Watch every scene pop with enhanced contrast and improved viewing angles through cool and warm LEDs that deliver well-balanced picture. Multiple Voice Assistants Control The Frame with just your voice with built-in Samsung Bixby, Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.* Change the channel, play music, control smart home devices and more — ask more from your TV.

Sound optimized to your space For the best possible sound no matter where you place it, The Frame self-calibrates the audio to the room's acoustics. Bring more than a billion colors to life With 100% Color Volume, Quantum Dot Technology delivers over a billion shades of color that stay true-to-life without washing out at any level of brightness. Style and personalize art Transform The Frame into a beautiful work of art when you're not watching TV. The built-in Motion Sensor detects when you walk into the room to automatically turn on and display your favorite selections. The built-in Brightness Sensor adjusts to your room for a realistic display. Powerful, intelligent 4K processing Samsung's powerful processor takes your viewing experience to the next level, with technology that automatically optimizes both picture and sound for a more immersive experience. SpaceFit Sound Quantum Dot Art Mode Quantum Processor 4K

1 Year Accidental Television Extended Protection Whether it’s part of your home entertainment system, or simply for watching movies and shows, people enjoy watching TV. However, sometimes accidents can occur that can break, or drastically impact the performance of the TV. This includes dropping the TV while moving or mounting, and kids hitting or knocking the TV over. It even protects you from burn-in, something not typically covered by the OEM. Plus, if something happens to your remote control, you can ask for a hot swap replacement without question. 1 Year Accidental Television Extended Protection Features Accidental Damage coverageImpact DamageDropping while moving or mounting the TVFrom kids playing ball in the houseBurn in covered - usually not covered by the OEMRemote Control replacement - hot swap, no question askedTech Support Included - initial product setup and/or configurationAuthorized service dispatched by Consumer Priority Service

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, this tv doesn't disappoint!
reviews.reviewText: Gorgeous tv, really looks like a painting!! Not too difficult to hang unless it's up higher like above a fireplace. Double check the instructions because it's easy to hang the brackets upside down. If done correctly the bracket behind the tv will not show at all. Default art is beautiful. Definitely pair with an additional frame purchase! Quality is excellent, use with gaming, streaming, audio is excellent as well. We paired ours with Polk Audio command bar & sub woofer and the sound is phenomenal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best TV ever!
reviews.reviewText: Love this tv, absolutely no reflection and it looks like a painting when not being used as a tv. Also like that it has a remote box with multiple different inputs so that it needs only one cable from the box to tv.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this TV (55 in)in May 2022. Noticed a significant color change on the right side of the TV a couple months ago. We decided to call and were told service would come out for $140.00 non-refundable fee, but decided to move forward as we don’t like filling landfills with TV’s. The tech arrived and looked at the TV (ran the diagnostics that I’d already run with Samsung tech help on the phone) told us that we needed a $900 screen and we should just buy a new one. Collected his $140 and left. I called Samsung and they agreed to provide us a new screen thankfully. I’ve seen multiple videos on YouTube showing this is an issue. Seems the service company is just running around and collecting checks for a sub-par TV. I’ve had many flat screen TVs for many years. All are still working and have gone through multiple house moves and are at our kids houses etc. Very disappointing that an expensive “fancy” frame TV would have such a short life. I definitely would not recommend this type of Samsung TV to anyone regardless of them being willing to repair in this situation. If you do, plan on needing service and get an extended warranty!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This TV is simply, amazing. Never mind the artwork that you can download for the TV to make it a painting, the picture is outstanding. It's almost too real! Expensive, but worth the money. Fantastic!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Love this TV. It looks soooo good on the wall. Only downsides: it’s difficult to hang and 50% more expensive than similar picture quality TVs. Would definitely shell out for the expert installation next time. The premium price is worth if you really want your TV to look like part of the room design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quick and painless installation and setup
reviews.reviewText: The TV speaks for itself. IT’s installation was fairly easy using toggle bolts that were purchased separately. My only complaint is that Samsung could have provided one piece template for that. Otherwise looks great on the wall with wide choice of artwork.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product so far!
reviews.reviewText: Frame TV works great! You can add your own art/images using a thumb drive. The Samsung Art membership is not great. Most of the art is cheesy and not worth the $5 a month. Very slim and nice if you want art on your wall and not a tv.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really amazing picture, sound and overall style.
reviews.reviewText: We had a gas fireplace installed abd wanted a new TV to go over it. This is perfect. We don't have any wires showing and we show beautiful artwork when the TV isn't being watched.
